website_summaries.verdict: One of the best ILIFE robotic vacuums meant for hardwood floors. Can clean without damaging hard surfaces.
pros: Adjustable suction strength and motor power means you can tailor the vacuum's use to different types of messes
Can schedule different cleanings throughout the day or week
cons: Limited self-charging capabilities will not force the vacuum to return to the charging port when low

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this brand
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy to buy this for my mom. I started using it last week and it stops working after 15 minutes on a full charge. Amazon won’t give my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek B.

customer_reviews.title: Started out great, but have more and more issues after.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum was on regular usage but started to constantly having errors and shuts itself off constantly. The sensor had to be cleaned constantly or the sensor error code will pop up every 5 minutes. The vacuum also seems to have pathing issues. On occasion huge sections will be skipped completely when actually inspected. The vacuum also often fails to make it back to home base even with no error occurring.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Shieh

customer_reviews.title: I love how it comes with a remote control
customer_reviews.text: I have a V3 that has been cleaning my bedroom for about a year now. I love how it comes with a remote control. That makes it much easier for me to just tell it to go back to its dock. I also had a Roomba that I got from Costco for about $400 with no remote. It would keep giving me error notifications. So I returned the Roomba and got another one of these for my living room. When I got this new one, I couldnt charge it using the dock but that happened with the previous one as well. If that happens just clean the pins on the dock and the vacuum itself. That fixed my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Will break down within 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it which is unfortunate because it had a lot of promise. The first few months I had no complaints. It’s a high powered and I liked how it mapped out my apartment; however, fast forward a month, and I started to receive “E42” error messages that would interrupt then clean cycle. This appears to be a glitch in the vacuum and numerous people of complained about the same issue. I wouldn’t recommend this product because you’ll likely have to replace it within 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy !!! E42 Error.
customer_reviews.text: This robot gave up after 2 months of use. Now it never completes the full cycle and breaks down intermittently throwing E42 error. Reached out to customer care and followed all the instructions but no luck. Now they are asking the product to be shipped at their facility for repair and you are responsible for the shipping cost. My advice is to stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: ashwajeet

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great vacuum robot
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great vacuum robot. I have Ilife v5 and a Shark 750 for a carpet area.. now I bought thos Ilife V8s for my floors and is amazing.. nothing different from Roomba.. this one makes less noise, stronger suction and 6 levels that makes the difference. My only complaint is that I need the hepa filters.. but I learn to search for other models filters with same size. But the robot is amazing. Don't waste money on expensive brands, you are paying only the brand, this is better, stronger and friendly. I recommend for dirt places because its trash space is bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Morazan

customer_reviews.title: Who hates to mop our wood floor? This guy!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted light wood floors. I of course convinced her to get dark floors with the caveat that I would mop regularly. Turns out regularly is daily bc dirt is so noticeable. Worst decision ever. This robot was the best decision. It’s wonderful for wood floors bc of its dual vacuum/mop action. It’s a little erratic with its pattern but seems to get 95%+ of the area accurately. We call ours “drunk robot”.
customer_reviews.author: Duvius

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this. It was on sale with a coupon code for under 200. It arrived today, unboxed it, plugged it in to charge, and...nothing. it won't charge. Won't power up. Was looking forward to replacing my 14 year old Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: Robbey

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Used it daily for about a month before E42! started popping up on the screen. It started stopping the clean cycle maybe once or twice at first, but it's gotten worse. I have cleaned the vacuum multiple times and attempted to problem solve, but its stopping the clean cycle about 10x now. Its more of a hassle than vacuuming with a regular vacuum. I didnt buy the vacuum to babysit it! I have the eufy brand vacuum as well and haven't had a problem, and I've had it for 2 months. I wish I would have bought another one of those instead of this vacuum. Unfortunately I missed the return period, or I would be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jury out
customer_reviews.text: Love the vacuum feature! It really picks up a lot. Not sure about the mopping, it keeps shutting down throughout this cycle. So far have only gotten it to mop for less than 5 minutes before it just stops. The battery... first time we used it the battery was great! Since then, even after letting it charge overnight, it barely makes it through a small room before dying. Doesn’t even make it back to the base! Will update if we figure out how to get it to mop a whole room and/or get the battery to last.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Garman

customer_reviews.title: much better than my old roomba but much cheaper
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I had fleas infestation and this ILIFE is powerful enough that it sucks all the fleas! Roomba could not do it. ILIFE is much better than my old roomba but much cheaper. I love the regime where it divides the room into squares and thoroughly cleans each square of the room. Nothing gets missed! I also love that there is a cover for a chamber, so the trapped fleas cannot escape until I empty it into ziplock in the morning. Mopping feature is cool too. I purchased a 10-pack of additional mops, so I don't need to wash them one by one manually and can load into laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Vardin

customer_reviews.title: My first robot floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a robot floor cleaner and I am very impressed. I have a tile floor throughout the entire house and in the first pass this machine could navigate the entire house, in and out of all the rooms by itself and did a tremendous job of collecting dirt, dust, and dog hair. It beeped when it was full. I emptied it and let it finish cleaning and then it docked itself back in the base. I have no comparison but I am thrilled to have this device. I find it very easy to use and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Slinkychang

customer_reviews.title: Was the best thing ever for 2 months...then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this vacuum, did a fantastic job and was easy to use. But after only a couple months, it stopped working reliably. It will start and clean for a few minutes - maybe several minutes - then stop and give an error message. It's clean and well maintained but no matter what we do - it doesn't clean our floors anymore. I am incredibly disappointed, as I never wanted to go a day without this vacuum but it no longer works. I'm past the return window and the customer support number is longer listed on my order information (I purchased this item 3 months and 3 days ago).
customer_reviews.author: Eloise

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum! Just moved to new home with dark wood-tone vinyl plank flooring. The floors showed so much dust and dirt, I was regretting my choice in floors. Every morning when sun came through the floors looked disgusting! We ordered the life v8s mop&vacuum w 750ml dustbin. It is great, vacuum and moping are both great. Now I love my floors again! We only have 1 area rug and it works there too. I don't usually comment on products, but this one deserves good marks. It is somewhat noisy, but, hey, it's a vacuum cleaner! Beware, 2 year old boys think it's a toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Very best value robot. Clean corners,works on schedule, charge itself. Mop should be improved
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this one and we are very happy with this. It clean the floor before the battery charge ends. Very easy to clear, visit spots multiple times to ensure dustfree floor/carpet, works on scheduled time, works with remote. Two small weakness- Finding charger for itself it tricky, algorithm should be improved and charger has to send strong signal to robot can just go there directly instead of trying to find home. Second, mop should be improved. It is not best one. Mop really need some good improvements. Overall very good value for money. We are happy!
customer_reviews.author: dipak8959

customer_reviews.title: mopping attachment broke after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: The regular vacuum function works well on hardwoods/tile (not great on carpet, but I expected that from reviews). I was really interested in this version of the Ilife for the mopping function which works kind of like a wet swiffer. Not great for a deep clean, but good for sporadic use. I maybe used the mopping function/attachment 5 times since purchase and the other day I picked up the attachment and it completely broke into two parts without any trauma happening to the unit! Amazon says I'm out of my window for product support, so hopefully Ilife will do the right thing and replace this part. I will update my review if there is any change
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D.

customer_reviews.title: Every household needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great! I looked at every option possible and am so glad I choose this one at half the cost of most mop/vacuums. It’s mop feature is really awesome, it can clean a large area on one tank of water and is easy to use. I love that the mop pad is washable and reusable. Both the vacuum and mop pick up a ton of dirt each time I use it. You do sometimes have to guide the machine if you want a certain area cleaned, but again for items price point it is awesome! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D.

customer_reviews.title: Pick it up, or the bot will get it!
customer_reviews.text: Strong suction at regular speed, even stronger when it is sped up. Great cleaning bot; random and covers all the areas. We have learned to pickup from the floor whatever we don't want to search from the clean tray. Works awesome! Wish it had some wall barriers of some sorts, but we have learned to leave stuff on the way so it bumps against it and can't go onto those areas.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months, it stopped working! Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my iLife v8s in 30 November/2018 (less than 2 months ago) and, at the beginning, the product worked perfectly, I use to love this! It was very effective in cleaning my floor (I have 2 cats), but know it keep showing the E42 error code and it doesn't work anymore! All the compartments are clear, I don't know what else to do! Please help me. Ps: I live in Brazil and there is no assistance over here.
customer_reviews.author: Cayssa

customer_reviews.title: Life expectancy
customer_reviews.text: It was a good little unit. lasted for 14 months the just died. Battery was working fine, docking station light is working, the vacuum shows no sigh of life. Was hoping she would of lasted longer. I was pleasantly surprised how clean the floors were, after she was done, also made me keep things off the floor that could stop her like charger cords, socks etc. will buy another one, may choose another brand though. cost about 73 cents a day. After figuring the cost just changed the stars from three to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis R, Lemay

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job! I have two dogs and they SHED. This is very able to pick up all the hair and whatever else is on the floor. I have used it on wood and carpet floors and it does well. It keeps things clean enough that I only have to go back and do a more thorough job once a week. The mopping function works well on the wood and tiles, too. The remote is good for turning it on and off, but that's about it. I've had a hard time programming a schedule, however, in fairness, that may just be me! Overall, LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace B

customer_reviews.title: We really love it...until
customer_reviews.text: This was great at the beginning. Pros: It goes all over my house and does a great job, great with pet hair and I was barely ever having to sweep or Mop Obviously it mops, that is a HUGE plus.It's a water mop only but still. Cons: It isn't great with carpet, after about 4 months I started having issues and had to contact the company who sent me parts to replace. This has happened twice. I have now noticed that it doesn't go in my kitchen anymore. Overall: Good for what I paid, but I would definitely spend the extra money if you have higher expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A

customer_reviews.title: So much better than my roomba!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing vacuum! We have a roomba at home and it's nice, but this feels so much more advanced. I've programmed it to run at the office and can vacuum every day, but also can run with wet attachment to mop at times.
customer_reviews.author: H. Jude Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: I never do reviews but I had to for this! I have had my iLife for about a year and a half now. Recently the plastic piece from the dustbin broke off. I contacted iLife to see how I could buy a new replacement part for it. I did not have any kind of warranty on my iLife. I got a really quick response from Andy saying he would get me one and ship it to me. Less than a week later I received a brand new dustbin for free of charge. Amazing customer service and my iLife has been amazing as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Roy Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Works for only a few months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great WHEN it did work!! After 8 months of usage it stopped working with a code E42. I contacted iLife, they mentioned it was a fatal error and sent me "new/refurb" one. That one worked for three months and started giving the same error. Now the machine is out of warranty and doesn't work. NO HELP from ILIfe on replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Kathren

customer_reviews.title: Moping not working
customer_reviews.text: I keep having issues with it when I try to use it for moping. It just stopped in the middle of the room without any notifications,it doesn’t even go back to the docking station. I am not sure what may be the reason for it ,it doesn’t do the same thing when I use it in vacuum mode
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to clear your floor of any cords or loose shoe laces.
customer_reviews.text: This machine cleans a limited area of surface dust and fur. Does not deep clean, you still need to use a regular vacuum at least twice a month for real clean. Be sure to empty the bin and clean the filter after every run. I run it every day since I have pets; it keeps up with most the stuff they drag in from the yard. It is good about getting itself out of being stuck, but it cannot disentangle itself from cords or shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2all

customer_reviews.title: Descent, but just started spazzing out
customer_reviews.text: Currently won’t shut off? Has this happened to anyone...it is standing still and just spinning the brushes
customer_reviews.author: James E McVeigh

customer_reviews.title: Roborto is great!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cleans our floors so good we decided to name him. "About time a man sweeps and mops!!!!" I started to purchase the $500 competitor, but when I read they reviews for the ILIFE and the 30 money back guarantee I decided to give it a try. It is just wonderful - he works and I read a book. Thank you, Update 6/7/2019 - "Roberto" ILIFE is still going strong!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelina Tina Aubrey-Gethers

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver. Give yourself more time for things that matter.
customer_reviews.text: This thing changed my lifestyle. I use this every other day or so and put off a thorough cleaning for like once a month. I have been using mop and vacuum both... The spot cleaning helps to take care of mess left behind by my lil doggo... food droppings and when he's missed his target on the pad. Only bad part about the vacuum is that the mop replacements come expensive and with brushes and filters.
customer_reviews.author: ParryB-Ishq

customer_reviews.title: Great for open floor plan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum it’s amazing. I got it before I had shoulder surgery a little over a month ago. I run it daily I have 2 dogs and 2 kids and a husband 🤣 it has been powerful enough to pull up loose carpet so keep it away from damaged carpet but other than that it has been amazing
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: I like the V5 better for mopping
customer_reviews.text: I use this both for vacuuming and for mopping. I like it for vacuuming all right, and it has just enough lower clearance so it doesn't get stuck under a piece of furniture, but the mopping is better on the V5. I think it has to do something with the programming and the remote but I can't be bothered trying to figure it out. I'll buy another v5.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Get stuck on the tiles, you have to physically move it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product get stuck on the Tile Floor. Mopping function does not recognizes between hard floor and the carpeted area. Parts are not easily available, I had been looking for the new mop clothes but still not able to find the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Imtiaz Sajwani

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!  such a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this baby and we are loving it!!!! Such a great help as a quick run through to pick up messes of my children after a day!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bryant-Phillips

customer_reviews.title: keeps getting error message and stopping every few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum worked well 1st 4 months; after that kept stopping with error messages - very annoying - not useful.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It will stop randomly during use, in the middle of a totally open floor with a nearly full charge. While it vacuums pretty well, the mopping feature does not do much. Also sometimes it will become unresponsive and you have to restart it, but when you restart it, all the programming, scheduling and clock are reset. Lastly, the homing feature does not work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Great but water tank broke
customer_reviews.text: Hi, so I bought an ilife v8s around 6 months ago. The problem is that the water tank is plastic and I don't know why but it is starting to break. I wanted to know where I can find a store that sells this. Thank you! Emiliano
customer_reviews.author: Emiliano P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Works amazingly, cleans the for so I don't have to!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I got it for Christmas and have not swept my floors since. It picks up everything. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tnikki

customer_reviews.title: It works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first vacuum robot, but I can say I am impressed with this one, it cleans, it mops, just what I needed. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: It fails a lot. This is almost new and the system is blocked, I have to leave it for a few hours and it works again. Terrible, I regret having bought it!
customer_reviews.author: William Poveda

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it broke
customer_reviews.text: Was great till it broke after having it 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to contain and tangles up in all cords
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum robot has no virtual walls, so containing it in large open house floor plans is difficult. It gets tangled in all cords and yanks stuff off of tables and breaks stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Terry H. Carter

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Will only run for 5 minutes and an E43 error comes up. Tried contacting customer service and no response. It’s cheap for a reason!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emiller19

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 vacuums. Both only lasted a month before the showed E42 and would no longer work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I liked the easily dumpable large dust bin. I don't like that the motor gave out after a couple months of occasional use. It starts and you hear a hum, then it doesn't engage then it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MOpping
customer_reviews.text: Don't mop as expected, the room are not mop complete. mead thee circles but not cover the whole room. The tanks is leaking when I am filling it.
customer_reviews.author: ddiaz1325

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mopping abilities, lasts for 900sq ft apartment, generally good navigation.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Better than roomba
customer_reviews.text: Still use it all the time. Have had about a year. Works better tha. My parents roomba
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product.
customer_reviews.text: It's a super product. Excelente quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing vacuum cleaner. We love ours. It does such a good job. It just stopped working within one year.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far. Does everything it says but it sometimes gets stuck or runs out of battery without going back to the charging port.
customer_reviews.author: LOUIS MUGIZI

customer_reviews.title: Not working now
customer_reviews.text: Mine isnt working for a moth. It is still under warranty . Please let me know how i can send it to fix or replace!
customer_reviews.author: Mini

customer_reviews.title: It's not smart completely, but for the price compared to the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not smart completely, but for the price compared to the competition it's worth every penny. What I do is that I move the unit to each large room so that I can vacuum and then use the mop system ,sometimes it gets lost and does not get the charging station
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Millan

customer_reviews.title: Poor algorithm. Vacuum mode does better
customer_reviews.text: Mop function only works if tank for fluid is empty. Gets stuck, lost, does not cover area. Poor algorithm. Vacuum mode does better, skips areas and does not make transition to large area rug. I want a refund so I can buy something else that is more expensive that can at least vacuum entire house.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: ... only had this a few days but it is amazing so far
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this a few days but it is amazing so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Merlino

customer_reviews.title: Not great at mopping but has some good points
customer_reviews.text: ILIFE V8s Robotic Mop&Vacuum. It wipes the floor with one pass only. Would do a better job washing the floor if it had multiple passes without my having to start it up again. It's a damp mop only, no rough pad. I like the Big dustbin as you don't have to empty it often like my earlier model iLife. I would recommend that iLife reprogram for multiple passes and a scrubbing pad. This would improve the mopping option significantly. I like the drip system instead of a spray which would dampen furniture legs. Haven't tried the vacuuming feature yet as the floor had already been swept. Will repost later.
customer_reviews.author: Rolene

customer_reviews.title: works well adn keeps the floor clean
customer_reviews.text: I have a doodle dog and she leaves tufts of hair about. This gets them all and seems to hold a decent amount of hair before I need to dump it. It does have a tendency to go over a spot multiple times but our place isn't big and it works for me. its not very quiet but its also not annoying. I set him free after I've cleaned the dishes each night and waske up to a clean floor. Even the edges. Keep your outside doors closed, my friends went out on to the deck and almost off the stairs. HA! Cat hates it. I haven't tried the mop feature yet.
customer_reviews.author: Msdiddy

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well but can't find base, clock is reset on power off
customer_reviews.text: It does a pretty good cleaning job so far, but it is definitely for smaller houses or apartments. Controls aren't super intuitive, and navigation is not the smartest. It cleans at random or in spirals. It has a very hard time finding it's base to recharge. The clock gets reset everytime it is turned off, which makes scheduling useless.
customer_reviews.author: Certified Feedback Master

customer_reviews.title: This thing sux in a bad way compared to roomba
customer_reviews.text: I have a roomba 600 series I also have a white braava jet. I bought this ilife trying to consolidate. Bad idea. It is worse at each function. As a vacuum it gets stuck and its spin brushes fall off As a mop, its super messy The water flows out of it dripping everywhere, the pad is soaked before you even begin. It goes randomly around floor. Directionally, and autonomously vs. the 2 irobot machines they both have way better algorithms and sensors than this ilife. I wish I could return it. My 1st one arrived DOA, the replacement is working but just isn't hands free enough. Its not user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Dubl-A

customer_reviews.title: HOT GARBAGE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a V5 that I absolutely loved but it stopped taking a charge. The V8 here doesn't pick up very good in dust and dirt mode and is completely worthless in the mop mode. In the mop mode as soon as the wheels get even slightly wet it won't go anywhere it just sits there and spins its wheels and then shuts down and that's just with straight water. With the V5 it happened sometimes but not that often. The V8 cost $100 more and is hot garbage
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - maybe received a faulty?
customer_reviews.text: It was great at first, but after using it for 2 months (and following all maintenance procedures), received an E42 fault and died. My daughter has the same brand but different model and has worked for years so maybe we received a faulty vacuum?
customer_reviews.author: addifam

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for couple of weeks now. So far do better job cleaning my hard floor than my previous Romba and last longer. Its pick almost all my Husky hair much better as well. Best thing is that there is no brushes to clean of hairs. Getting it to mop took me some time as got stuck everywhere but learned not to use to much soap. Now it is doing a good job. It is easy to set the schedule. My wife love it, so won some points with her. In overall, it is a great product, inexpensive and do the expected work.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Santiago

customer_reviews.title: 4 Wheel Dr. vacuum cleaner! If you go anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Besides being the best cat toy ever it is very .powerful. It is picked up my Apple Watch and ate the band after it pulled the cord and wooden charger base off of the night stand. It has no problem whining from my Pergo floor to my bath mats that are incredibly sick. Ergo powerful. The map feature must be adjusted otherwise it is considerably more liquid than needed. After that is adjusted you are good to go. Very amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Re’ Richards

customer_reviews.title: Bummed w/this robot
customer_reviews.text: Bummed that the battery life didn't last long enough for all areas; would stop in random places- n ou t return "home" to charge. Did not cover all areas automatically so many areas went unvaccuumed. For mopping, the cleaning solutions would leak out and ruined my floors due to warping.:-( I am going to get the more expensive version and hope it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Honest

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price I really hoped it would do a better job. - has a hard time finding its home base - cleans ok not great. iRobot is much more thorough - battery life is very poor. The iLife has this bizarre habit of draining its battery and then running in non vacuum mode for 20 minutes trying to find its base to charge again - dustbin seems pretty small, and its harder to clean it out than iRobot - mopping function is nice to have, again average Overall it’s an ok product, but very overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Peters

customer_reviews.title: good quality for a clean house
customer_reviews.text: we bought ilife a few weeks ago, we have tried and tested in all possible floors and conditions. Good: very clean floors, go into small obstacules and low carpets, mopping very useful, Less good: i bit noisy, doesnt go into thicker carpepts, can repeat the same area many times,
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!  Frequent error codes, stops working
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a few months but now it stops over and over again with an E42 error code. I looked it up and it evidently has to do with cleaning the unit. I cleaned everything and it does not solve the problem. I will see if I can get a replacement or refund and will come back with a follow up review. But for now I would not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Error e42 after just 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for 6 months and can’t use it anymore. I get an error e42 in the first couple of minutes. I shut it down by holding the play button - I saw a comment somewhere that it could help - but it didn’t help. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It does an excellent job of vacuuming our wood floors, getting into every nook and cranny. The ability to mop is a nice addition. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Warren McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Filled up the container with lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Filled up the container with lots of debris after floor got pulled up. Can find the way home and doesnt bang walls hard at all. Glides along them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for Mint
customer_reviews.text: We used a Mint for several years. This is a great upgrade as it actually vacuums up the dirt, instead of collecting it on a swiffer pad.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Endless error messages, stopped working 7-8 months
customer_reviews.text: Kept having e42 error- tried many things but never could keep it going beyond a day without another error (this is about 8 months into owning it). It worked fine- inefficient but thorough- but not worth the money if breaking so soon.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Best price+quality
customer_reviews.text: I had an ilife v5s and love it so I decided to buy the new model. Really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have previously had a roomba—bought this for a less expensive choice but deeply disappointed. It doesn’t do a good job on my carpet at all and has a hard time vacuuming the whole area. I have more of an open concept house and it struggles to do the whole area so I still have to bring out another vacuum. I will say that I like it for the hard wood floors tho—better than my roomba but I wouldn’t buy it for that. I have not tried the mopping part yet. And I’m having a hard time finding the filters for this version
customer_reviews.author: mrsT

product_meta.title: ILIFE V8s Robotic Mop&Vacuum Cleaner with 750ML Big Dustbin, LCD Display and Multi-Task Schedule Function, Higher Suction Power Design for Hard Floors
feature_bullets: 2-IN-1 SWEEPING AND MOPPING: Sweeping system with Gen 3 CyclonePower System provides a powerful suction in vacuum mode. Mopping system with intelligent water tank, adjustable water output for adapting to different floor types. One Robot, Thorough Clean.
BIG 750ml DUSTBIN: A large dustbin ensures the V8s is able to clean larger spaces without frequent emptying.

ENHANCED SUCTION INLET: The unique suction structure ensures that pet hair and dirt go into the dustbin easily which makes the V8s great for pet owners. The floating design self-adjusts to adapt to different types of floors.
LCD DISPLAY: Easy to read icons are great for any user to easily operate.

What you get: 1 Robot ，1 Remote Control，2 filter，1 AC Adapter（About 1.5m length，1 Charging Base，1 Cleaning Brush，2 Side Brushes，1 Water tank ，1 Mop，2 AAA Battery，User's Quick Guide，User's manual.AND A 12-month warranty and U.S. customer service team provides you with peace of mind and timely service. Any questions, call 1-800-631-9676 from 9:00am-5:00pm CST, Monday-Friday.
